Description: Head of Septimius Severus, laureate, right. (obverse)
Mars, helmeted, naked except for cloak flying behind him, advancing right, holding spear pointing upwards to right in right hand and trophy over left shoulder in left. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RE5 / Coins of the Roman Empire in the British Museum, vol.V: Pertinax to Elagabalus (328, p.85)
RIC4 / The Roman imperial coinage, vol. 4: Pertinax - Uranius Antonius (350D, p.136) (type)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Septimius Severus
